author: Robert (Rosebud) Butt
description: A cooling, combination of four different white spirits, triple sec, lemon and lime, crowned with a splash of cola.
name: Long Island Iced Tea Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 12.5 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
60 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 8 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
